pulseInterferenceDamage.Name: Pulse Armor Interference Damage
pulseInterferenceDamage.Wiki: Bonus damage dealt to pulse armor, pulse protection, and terminal armor core expansions.\nDoesn't affect pulse shields, nor weapons that create pulse barrier assets.

pulseShieldInterferenceImpactDamage.Name: Pulse Shield Interference: Impact Damage
pulseShieldInterferenceImpactDamage.Wiki: Bonus impact damage dealt to opponents with pulse shields.\nDoesn't affect pulse armor or pulse protection.

pulseShieldInterferenceAccumlativeImpact.Name: Pulse Shield Interference: Accumulative Impact Damage
pulseShieldInterferenceAccumlativeImpact.Wiki: Bonus accumulative impact damage dealt to opponents with pulse shields.\nUses pulseShieldInterferenceImpactDamage for base impact damage.\nDoesn't affect pulse armor or pulse protection.

recoilKnockbackVelocity_Grounded.Name: Recoil Knockback (Grounded)
recoilKnockbackVelocity_Grounded.Wiki: Backwards velocity applied to the shooter when using a weapon on the ground.\nApplies conditionally, such as not applying when AC has tank legs.

recoilKnockbackVelocity_Airborne.Name: Recoil Knockback (Airborne)
recoilKnockbackVelocity_Airborne.Wiki: Backwards velocity applied to the shooter when using a weapon in the air.

hitboxShape.Name: Hitbox Shape
hitboxShape.Wiki: Backwards velocity applied to the shooter when using a weapon in the air.

attack_Object.Name: Attack Damage (Object)
attack_Object.Wiki: Base object damage. Responsible for damage dealt to assets, including EULE/60D [Pulse Shield Launcher] barriers.

weightAffectsDamage.Name: Weight Affects Damage
weightAffectsDamage.Wiki: Attack damage scales with weight according to calcCorrectGraph 280

useImpactRate.Name: Use Impact Rate
useImpactRate.Wiki: Determines if impact damage will be affected by SpEffect param.

wwise_ShootSeCategoryId.Name: Shoot Sound
wwise_ShootSeCategoryId.Wiki: Sound to produce when attack is initiated.\nReferences Row ID in WwiseValueToStrParam_Switch_ShootSeCategory.
